document.discussion_title: Fugitive sought for probation violation is arrested in Burnet County
document.topic_text: Fugitive sought for probation violation is arrested in Burnet County American-Statesman Monday 25th April, 2016 A fugitive wanted for violating probation and sought by federal authorities was recognized by a Burnet County sheriff’s deputy in the 600 block of Buchanan Drive in Burnet and arrested Saturday with assistance from Burnet police, officials said.Lacy Pearson Jr., 30, was taken to Burnet County Jail without incident, according to a statement from the Burnet County sheriff’s office.';The efforts and cooperation between agencies is commendable.
